name: AppBar

props.name: intent
props.description: Semantic color intent; maps to theme tokens

props.name: color
props.description: Explicit color override (theme token name or CSS color)

props.name: logo
props.description: Optional brand/logo node, typically an SVG

props.name: title
props.description: Optional primary title to the right of the logo

props.name: fixed
props.description: Whether the bar is fixed to the viewport (and offsets content). Defaults to true.

props.name: portal
props.description: Force portal behavior. Defaults to following `fixed` (true when fixed).

props.name: navigation
props.description: Optional navigation buttons; rendered inline for page-level navigation

props.name: navigationAlign
props.description: Where navigation buttons live; auto centers when both sides are populated

props.name: navigationLabel
props.description: ARIA label for the navigation group

props.name: preset
props.description: One or many style-preset names registered via `definePreset()`

bestPractices: Use for global navigation and primary actions; keep content concise to avoid overcrowding.
Keep the bar sticky only when it benefits navigation; avoid stacking multiple sticky bars.
Ensure contrast and focus styles for interactive items meet accessibility.
Balance icon vs text: label primary actions, reserve icon‑only for well‑known actions.
Coordinate with Drawer and Surface offsets so content doesn’t sit underneath.
Group navigation buttons with the `navigation` prop so they sit inline and respond to available space.
